def_cn: （武器、设备等）自动寻向的，自导引的
def_en: A weapon or piece of equipment that has a homing system is able to guide itself to a target or to give out a signal that guides people to it.

def_cn: （动物）有返回原地能力的
def_en: An animal that has a homing instinct has the ability to remember and return to a place where it has been in the past.
